english_example_sentence: Our neighbors always buy fresh vegetables from the local market.
russian_example_sentence: Наши соседи всегда покупают свежие овощи на местном рынке.
turkish_example_sentence: Komşularımız her zaman yerel pazardan taze sebzeler satın alırlar.
